Get around Cochabamba

Airport

Jorge Wilstermann International Airport is conveniently located 6 Km. away from downtown Cochabamba. To-From airport information is available at airport website.

Conference Buses

Special buses taking participants to the conferences are available. Check here for bus routes

Hotels

BCDE recommends the following hotels:

Hotel Toloma
(★ ★ ★ ★).
Hotel Regina (Prado)
(★ ★ ★ ★)
